info.author: Laurens Van Houtven
info.description: An experimental toolkit for building applications with a fractal architecture, using Twisted, Axiom (object serialization wtih SQLite), AMP (an RPC protocol) and Foolscap (an object-capability library for distributed systems).
info.name: exponent
info.summary: An experimental toolkit for applications with a fractal architecture
info.html_description: An experimental toolkit for building applications with a fractal architecture, using Twisted, Axiom (object serialization wtih SQLite), AMP (an RPC protocol) and Foolscap (an object-capability library for distributed systems).
